sentence.Network_en: He was at his happiest whilst playing cricket.
Whilst playing badminton, I ruptured my Achilles tendon.
sentence.Network_cn: 打羽毛球时，我的跟腱撕裂了。

sentence.Network_en: He wrote this whilst invigilating a biology examination.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是他在生物考试考场监考时写的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... mailing n. <美>邮寄, 投递, 邮件, <苏格兰>农场租金 whilst conj. 时时, 同时 prevent v. 防止, 预防.
以w开头的英语英文单词 ... while 当...的时候 whilst 同…同时；然而 whim 多变，怪念头.
财经英语学习_中华会计网校论坛 ... relax 放松 whilst 当……的时候，尽管 no longer 不再.
[推荐]外贸常用英语[旺旺英语论坛] ... while 一会儿 whilst 当...时，尽管 whip 抽打，搅 n.鞭子.

list.abs: whilst union membership and density is in across all sectors and organizational sizes , the greatest proportional rate of decline is found in smaller firms .虽然联盟成员和密度在所有部分和组织规模下都在减少，越小的公司有着最大的消减率。

the waves from that would create huge tsunami waves , destroying both coastlines and inland areas , whilst creating a thick cloud of dust that would darken the skies indefinitely .坠落产生的冲击波将制造出巨大的海啸海浪，摧毁沿海和内陆城市同时厚厚的尘埃云将笼罩天空的时间不知道会有多久。
whilst talking to Rose , she kept a sharp eye on the door .她在和路丝谈话的时候，眼睛就一直死盯着门口。

indeed , it is important to keep fit and healthy , whilst we all aspire to improve the way we look and feel in order to make good first and lasting impressions .事实上，为了得到一个良好的初次印象和持续印象，在保持体形和健康的同时，我们也渴望提高自己看待和感受他人的方式。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from whiles + -t as in against

entry.def: Whilst means the same as the conjunction while .

auth_sentence.content: They speak in one language whilst simultaneously interpreting another.
auth_sentence.res_content: They speak in one language whilst simultaneously interpreting another.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They speak in one language whilst simultaneously interpreting another.

auth_sentence.content: Which was fine whilst the web was small.
